title: Some people feel good getting an IFR notification.
body:
I don't. I mean, yes I'm glad that someone who does wrong is being punished. At the same time, when you see the notification that someone's been punished after **every game**, you start to get a pit in your stomach. It's like... "Why are there so many toxic players?" "Why am I being grouped with so many toxic players?" ...y'know? It's less about toxic players being punished and more about there being so many players that need to be punished.

It is what it is, though.
